response.headline: J-Scent Japanese perfume house discovery with affordable ¥4,950 bottles including Wood Flake, Hisui & Sumo Wrestler scents
response.summary: J-Scent is a famous Japanese perfume house offering unique fragrances with stories behind each scent. Despite loving their most famous Roasted Green Tea fragrance, the creator chose Wood Flake, Hisui & Sumo Wrestler scents at ¥4,950 per bottle due to affordability and already owning similar scents.

extracted_text: Finally had the chance to try this famous Japanese perfume house, J-Scent, and i must say... I'M IN LOVE WITH THE STORIES BEHIND EACH PERFUME. i even got to sniff their most famous perfume, Roasted Green Tea! it's beautiful but i passed on it since i already have something similar. PLUS, THEY'RE SO AFFORDABLE OMG LOVE, each bottle is only ¥4,950!!!
picked up Wood Flake, Hisui & Sumo Wrestler
I'm so glad to have discovered & smelled so many AMAZING perfumes during my trip to Japan! i might've gone a lil over my initial budget for perfume... more
image_details.key_interest: J-Scent Japanese perfume house with unique story-based fragrances at ¥4,950 per bottle
visual_hierarchy: Long text overlay about the experience
